text: so what people really want because they
want a fully managed graph database
that's fast it's reliable that's
scalable that doesn't force them into
one-size-fits-all choices and that's why
we're excited to announce today the
launch of Amazon Neptune which is a
fully managed draft database so Neptune
gives developers a lot of flexibility
and sports both the property model and
tinker pop and the RDF graph model it's
really fast and scalable and it allows
you to store billions of relationships
and query them with millisecond latency
it's really reliable so what we do is we
will make six replicas of your data
across three different availability
zones and continually back up to s3 and
then it's really easy to actually use
and the query we support both gremlin
and Sparkle so this is available in
preview today and we're excited to see
what you do with it
